data.title: Siavash Alamouti on LinkedIn: #marconisociety #youngprofessionals #youngscholars #youngentrepreneurs…
data.meta_description: This is a great opportunity to nominate next year’s Marconi Fellows and also accomplished young researchers that have been involved in groundbreaking research…
data.text:
We're thrilled to announce that Siavash Alamouti will deliver the keynote speech for the special session "𝗗𝗶𝗴𝗶𝘁𝗮𝗹 𝗧𝘄𝗶𝗻𝘀: 𝗪𝗶𝗹𝗹 𝗧𝗵𝗶𝘀 𝗕𝗲 𝘁𝗵𝗲 𝗞𝗶𝗹𝗹𝗲𝗿 𝗔𝗽𝗽 𝗳𝗼𝗿 𝟲𝗚?" on Wednesday, September 4th, from 14:10 - 15:50. 🎙️ Siavash Alamouti, Executive Chairman of the Board at mimik, is renowned for his groundbreaking contributions to the wireless industry, including the invention of the Alamouti Code, which is embedded in billions of wireless devices worldwide. His illustrious career spans leadership roles at Wells Fargo, Vodafone, Intel, and more, where he pushed the boundaries of technology for the betterment of humanity. In 2022, Siavash was honored with the prestigious Marconi Prize for his contributions to global wireless accessibility. With over 20,000 citations and numerous industry awards, he continues to drive innovation in areas like OFDM/MIMO, 5G, and hybrid edge cloud computing. Join us and learn from one of the brightest minds in the field about the latest advancements in digital twin technology. Don’t miss this chance to be part of the IEEE PIMRC 2024 and connect with the leading experts in telecommunications! 🚀 👉 https://lnkd.in/di5FPA48 #IEEE #PIMRC2024 #SiavashAlamouti #DigitalTwins #6G #TelecomInnovation #WirelessTech #TechLeaders #Telecommunications #Innovation #KeynoteSpeaker #TechConference #Elevating6GBeyondConnectivity

📢 New #LFEdge Blog! 💡 Leaders in LF Edge: An Interview with Sam Armani of mimik The edge computing landscape is exploding – IDC predicts a $350 billion market by 2027! 📈 As businesses rush to capitalize on the benefits of edge, strong leadership is key. Today, we're sitting down with Sam Armani, SVP of Business Development at Mimik Technology and LF Edge governing board member. Sam shares her insights on: 🔹The rise of the "Hybrid Edge Cloud" and its transformative potential 🔹Why a device-first approach is the future of edge computing 🔹The vital role of open source in driving innovation and collaboration 🔹How LF Edge is shaping the future of this dynamic technology landscape Read the full interview for an insider's perspective on where edge computing is headed, and why LF Edge is leading the charge: https://hubs.la/Q02CGBCm0 #LFEdge #EdgeComputing #OpenSource #DigitalTransformation #Leadership #Innovation #IoT #MimikTechnology
